scripts.name: Auto Disconnect
scripts.description: Disconnects after the current number of people is lower then the set threshold.

settings.name: Attendee Threshold
settings.description: If people currently in meeting is less then this number, the script auto-disconnects.

settings.name: Delay
settings.description: Delay that the script checks count after. (in milliseconds)

scripts.name: Auto Kick
scripts.description: Kicks a selected person every time they are in the meeting. (AutoKick Bot)

settings.name: Kick Delay
settings.description: Delay that the script acts after. (in milliseconds)

scripts.name: Auto Join Meeting
scripts.description: Auto-Join a meeting if available in the selected channel.

settings.name: Join Delay
settings.description: Delay that the script acts after. (in milliseconds)

settings.name: Wait time before joining
settings.description: Delay to wait before joining. (in milliseconds)

settings.name: Switch to a team/channel before searching
Switch to a team/channel before searching
Always See More
settings.description: Always display long messages without having to click the "See More" button

settings.name: Better Dark Mode
settings.description: Won't blind you everytime you start Teams

settings.name: Remove annoyances
settings.description: Removes bloat/annoying features from the platform
